title: Cosmic Queries: GMOs with Bill Nye (Part 2)
description: Just in case Part 1 wasn’t controversial enough, Bill Nye and Chuck Nice are back to answer new fan questions about Genetically Modified Organisms, unintended consequences, pollinator problems and more.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: Just in case Part 1 wasn’t controversial enough, Bill Nye and Chuck Nice are back to answer new fan questions about Genetically Modified Organisms, unintended consequences, pollinator problems and more.
